query:
UPDATE accounts
         SET total_deposits = COALESCE((
             SELECT SUM(amount) FROM cash_flows
             WHERE account_id = $1 AND flow_type = 'DEPOSIT'
         ), 0),
         total_withdrawals = COALESCE((
             SELECT SUM(amount) FROM cash_flows
             WHERE account_id = $1 AND flow_type = 'WITHDRAWAL'
         ), 0)
         WHERE id = $1
